latex:
Find (in terms of $n \ge 1$) the number of terms with odd coefficients after expanding the product:\\
\[\prod_{1 \le i < j \le n} (x_i + x_j)\]e.g., for $n = 3$ the expanded product is given by $x_1^2 x_2 + x_1^2 x_3 + x_2^2 x_3 + x_2^2 x_1 + x_3^2 x_1 + x_3^2 x_2 + 2x_1 x_2 x_3$ and so the answer would be $6$.
